verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power in the name of Jesus
There is power in the name of Jesus

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
To break every chain
To break every chain
To break every chain

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
All sufficient sacrifice
So freely given
Such a price bought
Our redemption
Heaven's gates swing wide

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
There's an army rising up
There's an army rising up
There's an army rising up
To break every chain
To break every chain
To break every chain
